title: No.Mans.Sky-CODEX
description:
C O D E X
P R E S E N T S

No Man's Sky (c) Hello Games

Release Date :  08/2016              Protection : Steam
Discs        :  1                    Genre      : Action

Inspired by the adventure and imagination that we love from classic
science-fiction,  No  Man's  Sky  presents  you with  a  galaxy  to
explore, filled with unique  planets and  lifeforms,  and  constant
danger and action. In No Man's Sky, every star is the  light  of  a
distant sun, each orbited by planets filled with life, and  you can
go to any of them you choose.

For more info go to : http://store.steampowered.com/app/275850/

- Extract
- Burn or mount the .iso
- Run setup.exe and install
- Copy crack from CODEX dir to installdir
- Play

General Notes:
- Block the game's exe in your firewall to prevent the game from
trying to go online ..
- If you install games to your systemdrive, it may be necessary
to run this game with admin privileges instead
